archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Distribute Service Problem Notifications
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description This process makes the necessary reports about the Service Problem that occurred, the root cause and the activities carried out for restoration. Extended Description Not used for this process element Explanatory Not used for this process element Mandatory This process makes the necessary reports about the Service Problem that occurred, the root cause and the activities carried out for restoration.
